name: body without organs
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/body-without-organs

In body without organs you have to survive and live a miserable life.

You die when your life runs out, or your sadness is maxed. In this case maybe death is indeed welcome.

To prevent, or accelerate, the inevitable death you have to buy organs for your own body without organs. Buy food and drinks to fuel your organs. Sell and buy better organs. Beware fat and poison. Eat your vegetables.
